name: Okobe.co.uk
overview:
Following almost two years of development, Okobe.co.uk officially launched in the UK in 2008.

Since then Okobe.co.uk has rapidly grown into a leading specialist of consumer electronics, computer components, networking equipment and computer software. Our growth has been underpinned by a creative and energetic team who passionately believe in delivering an outstanding customer experience.

As a result all of our systems and processes have been designed to deliver you a clear, concise and hassle-free shopping experience.

We also have a dedicated and experienced Customer Services Team who are contactable seven days a week to advise or assist you with any questions or queries you may have.

Of course, no matter how clear and refined our website is you are also interested in getting the best possible price for the products you are looking to buy! Well, at Okobe.co.uk we check our prices on a daily basis to make sure the prices on our website are competitive and the very best prices we can possibly offer you. We are always trying to source the latest products on the market at the lowest possible prices.

At Okobe.co.uk we have created a secure shopping environment that we ourselves would be happy to use and shop from!
